title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Understanding and Analyzing Spatter Phenomena in L-PBF Additive Manufacturing

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic metalworking processes and laser machining, with high school-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Explain the physical mechanisms of spatter phenomena occurring in the L-PBF (Laser Powder Bed Fusion) process
Numerically analyze the impact of process variables—such as laser power and scan speed—on spatter generation
Evaluate the industrial applicability of high-speed video analysis and machine learning-based particle tracking technologies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
